column2: Traffic;Pursat:------ People traveling on the road from O’Som to Tang Chan River
column4: are facing hardships as a result of the road. Rainy weather has made it especially difficult to transport produce to the market.------Another road
column5: from O’Som to Pursat’s Veal Veng district
column6: is also in an appalling. Motorbikes and cars are getting stuck and need to be pulled out. As many of the citizens are dependent on agricultural trade
column7: they are appealing to authorities for help.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/368061
